title: Joevester Takyi-Sarpong: Man charged with Doncaster murder
article: A 26-year-old man has been charged with the murder of another man who was stabbed to death in South Yorkshire. Joevester Takyi-Sarpong, 18, was found dead on Catherine Street, Doncaster, on 1 November last year. His body was discovered by a member of the public.A post-mortem examination showed he died from stab wounds.South Yorkshire Police said Jordan Davies, of no fixed address, has been charged and is due to appear before Doncaster magistrates later.Follow BBC Yorkshire on Facebook , Twitter and Instagram . Send your story ideas to yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk .
